attributes.action: declare Whitley Bay an area of outstanding natural beauty and of special sociological interest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With its dimly lit streets and stunning beaches, Whitley Bay can truly be classed as the coastal heartland of the North East of England. The fascinating cultural diversity that exists in the area only serves to highlight how special this place truly is. Please sign this petition and support my campaign to have Whitley Bay given the status it truly deserves.
